line.text: The little Love-god lying once asleep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Laid by his side his heart-inflaming brand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst many nymphs that vowed chaste life to keep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Came tripping by but in her maiden hand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The fairest votary took up that fire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which many legions of true hearts had warmed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And so the general of hot desire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Was sleeping by a virgin hand disarmed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This brand she quenched in a cool well by
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which from Love fire took heat perpetual
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Growing a bath and healthful remedy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For men discased but I my mistress thrall
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Came there for cure and this by that I prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Love fire heats water water cools not love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
